document.full_text: saudi arabia is printing 1.5 million copies of an edict by religious scholars outlawing protests in the conservative kingdom as un-islamic, the state news agency said on tuesday.
document.title: saudi prints 1.5 million copies of anti-demo edict
lines_and_colors: saudi arabia is printing 1.5 million copies of an edict by religious scholars outlawing protests in the conservative kingdom as un-islamic, the state news agency said on tuesday.
